metadata.title: DEAD Night and the DEAD ruck

tracks.text: Living run between cars. Dead feed on the fallen.
Takagi sleeps on a couch. Her foot dangles over an arm rest. She wears micro shorts and a loose, thin tank top.
Her moist skin glistens. She sleeps, her face slightly red.
Cars grid lock on the Onbetsu bridge
Shizuka's long, slender legs twitch. She sleeps on the floor, wrapped in a sheet. Her long, straight blond hair spans out around her. She shifts, and the blanket falls from her glistening body.
Police cars flash amongst the grid locked cars facing the bridge.

Rei's slender, pale legs dangle down the spiral stair case joining the kitchen to the bedroom. She rests her shoulder on the railing and stares into the distance. She wears a pink tank top and white panties.
On the street, a man fires a shotgun at a dead woman.

Saiko bends over, a black thong peaking between her toned butt and thighs. A loose, frilly white apron barely contain her large, dangling breasts. She pulls a bumpy goya fruit from the fridge and presses it to her lips.
Outside, the puppy barks at shuffling dead.
Hirano and Takashi look down from the balcony. Dead reach up towards the complex.
Takashi looks out into the night. He grips the shotgun.

Stylized pictures. Rei stares at us from school. Takagi adjusts her glasses from the cat walk. Hirano shoots a handmade gun. A young girl smiles with a puppy. Shizuka thrusts out her ample chest. Saiko grips a samurai sword. Takashi smiles at us.
Poster of the character with the text, Are you ready?
Bullets fall. Text, High School of the Dead
Blood and neon paint splatters
H.O.T.D.
Takashi and Rei stand on a roof. Rei holds a machine gun.
The wind blows their hair. Takashi turns to look at Rei. Rei turns away.
Takagi stis on an ornate chair in the middle of a dance floor. She wears a frilly white dress and clutches her knees and looks down. Below her sits a pair of ballet slippers.
Shizuka lies in bed, wearing a loose tank top and thong that frames her ample butt. She looks up and mouths the lyrics, "where"
An American rifle. Rei's thighs squeeze a baton.
Bullets fall. Hirano points a rifle.
Saiko stands in a river of red in front of the Onbetsu bridge. She unsheaths a katana sword.
Takashi stands on the school roof in the rain, looking over the railing. He turns and looks down. A young girl with pink hair holds out purple flowers.
A group of 6 runs across the roof. Saiko strikes a zombie with a boken. She runs, breaks another zombie's arms, gets behind it, strikes its head, and keeps running.
Hirano and a puppy stare determinedly. A hummer drives down a highway lined in missing posters. Hirano shoots a gun from the top while Takagi cheers.
Rei runs down the school hallway, striking a zombie with a broom handle. She leaps and split kicks 2 zombies. Takashi swings a bat.
Rei and the purple haired girl embrace with torn clothes. Zombies reach out to them in all directions.
Shizuka runs, her ample breasts bouncing.
Takagi lies on a bed, staring at us, knees spread.
The purple haired girl presses her chest against a chain link fence.
Takashi holds flowers and looks up at the gray sky. Blood splatters the sky.
A brown haired man shoots a shotgun. Saiko looks up from preparing an elaborate bento meal.
The man shakes as he loads rounds into the double barrel. He drops one and it rolls across the asphalt. He grabs it, stands, and smiles. He looks up, and 3 dead tower over him.
Text written in blood on the street, Act 7, DEAD night and the DEAD rucj
The puppy barks as the dead pile over running blood. Saiko watches through binoculars.
Saiko walks away. Hirano sees her thong and grabs his nose.
Saiko walks inside and runs her finger down a slit in the wall. The lights dim and go out.
binoculars
Takashi takes the binoculars. Saiko walks away into the dark bedroom. He frowns.
She stops, pauses, then turns, wearing a gentle smile.
She walks down the spiral stairs. Takashi turns and walks back onto the balcony. Hirano sits in the corner, holding his nose.

Takashi crouches behind opaque railing and raises the binoculars to his eyes. He sees dead tear apart a living man against a vending machine. Elsewhere, a living man bangs on an apartment door. Silhouettes inside watch as dead surround the knocking man.
He looks down as a man and girl run down the street. They enter through the front gate of a large, expensive house with a lit front yard.
The man opens the gate carrying a wrench. He drags a pink haired young girl.
The dad pulls the gate closed.
He presses his head against the door.
He clenches his fingers into a fist.
He lifts the wrench
The door opens
A chef's knife taped to a broom handle stabs him in the chest.
He looks down.
Blood spreads across the back of his shirt.
He looks up. The man in the house shakes and cries. A family cowers behind him.
The man pushes the dad back. The girl watches blood drip in front of her face.
He pulls the spear out. The dad sways.
The dad drops the wrench. The man closes the door.
The dad backs up to the front gate and slides to the ground. The gate opens. The girl runs over to him.
He pats her head. His hand drops and she catches it.
Tears well in her eyes and run down her face. His hand slips from her fingers. His eyes grow vacant, and his head slumps.
The dead in the street turn.
They approach the gate.
From a block away, Takashi lowers his binoculars and shakes his head.
Hirano pulls a lever, moves a dial to Fire, and raises the sniper rifle.
The first dead goes limp. The girl watches it fall.
She crawls back, jostling her dead father. More dead approach.

Headshots Takagi sleeps, legs spread, dreaming of Hirano saying her name. A dead woman in a skimpy bikini drops. Saiko looks up in the kitchen. A dead man in glasses drops. Shizuka sleeps, naked, her arms wrapped around her body. A dead girl drops, flashing its underwear. Rei looks up abruptly, her breasts jiggling pointedly.
The puppy runs down the street towards the expensive house.
Hirano looks through the rifle, grinning. Takashi looks over his shoulder.
Takashi smiles and turns around.
Rei looks up as he comes down the stairs.
Saiko looks up the stairs from the foyer.
She spins her sword. She poses, her legs spread, hand on her butt.
Takashi turns down the light.
Revolver
He picks it up. She clutches his hands. He nods. She smiles.
Dead trickle down the street in front of the complex. Behind the complex, Takashi gets on the orange bike.
Takashi sits at the top of a hill. Rei sets up a ramp in front of the parking lot gate. Head lights turn on.
He pulls on fingerless gloves. He nods. Rei and Saiko turn to each other and nod.
In the street, dead look up and turn.
Takashi drives. The girls open the gate, revealing dead.
He launches up and flies over the dead.
Rei looks up. Saiko looks up. They smile as he flies in slow motion. Hirano grins and points his gun up. Takagi puts on her glasses on the couch.
Shizuka sleeps.
Takashi lands in the street and drives.
He races down the street. He kicks a dead.
He weaves between the dead.
Takagi walks down cement stairs.
Saiko and Rei turn.
Hirano fires
Dead drop in front of Takashi
He pops out a magazine and replaces it with one hand.
He breaks and slides. He fish tails his bike, knocking a dead woman back.
He enters the yard, and his bike bounces on a body. He falls back.
The bike falls over. He covers his head.
He turns to the corner of the yard.
The puppy stands in front of the girl, barking at the dead. Takashi pulls out his crowbar.
He runs to the gate, and headshots drop the dead. He looks up.
Hirano smiles
A dead man reaches out
Takashi strikes the dead man. The puppy and girl look up at him.
He swings at another dead.
Text, High School of the Dead
Shizuka sleeps in the dark.
She sits up. Cartoon flowers float from her head.
Takagi's temple throbs
She squeezes Shizuka's cheeks.
Takashi runs across the yard, crowbar in hand.
He strikes a dead man
He strikes another.
He stumbles back and drops the crowbar. He pulls out the revolver and puts it in the dead woman's mouth.
It falls back.
She holds up her palms and shakes her head.
He turns. Takagi stands in a tank top and micro shorts. Shizuka barely covers her naked body with a medical bag. Hirano covers his crotch with his gun as blood drips down his nose.
She lifts the bag.
He steams
The girls look back at her.
Rei nods
Her glasses shine decisively. In the yard, Takashi looks at the girl.
She holds the puppy and looks down at her dad.
Takashi looks at the body.
He steps forward, picks up a shirt from the laundry, and picks a purple wild flower.
He covers the man's face with the white cloth, then presents the flower to the girl.
She blinks and looks at the flower. Tears well up in her eyes.
She places the flower over her father's chest.
She cries into Takashi's chest.
The flower petals shift in the breeze.
Shizuka and Rei look at bags of supplies.
Saiko opens the gate, runs to the humvee, and looks into the night.
Shizuka unlocks the left door and gets behind the wheel.
Rei and Takagi open the hatchback and drop their bags. In the yard, Takashi holds the girl.
The dead reach through the gate
He looks at the wall surrounding the yard. Hirano looks at the humvee.
He looks at the dense crowd of dead in front of the yard.
A light flashes at his eyes. He looks down at Takagi waving a flashlight. He waves back at her, then picks up his supplies.
He looks over and grins.
The wall is the width of a single foot, just above the height of the dead. He walks along it, carrying the girl on his back.
Takashi looks down at the sea of reaching dead below him as he steps.
The puppy licks his face.
Hirano turns the corner, wearing strands of ammo wrapped around his military vest. He carries several guns strapped over his body. The girls turn to stare at him.
On the wall
He winces. His face turns dark with despair and he sheds a tear.
A dead woman grabs his foot. He sways and stumbles. He kicks the dead woman.
Sweating, he looks at the sea of dead.
Headlights. He looks up and smiles. The puppy, tucked in his jacket, barks.
The humvee drives down the road. Saiko stands on the roof, the wind blowing her apron, revealing her thong. She holds the sword.

Hirano stands, his torso reaching out of the round hatch in the roof. He holds a gun. She stands over him, straddling his head. Takagi crouches in the back of the car. Rei sits in the passenger seat. Shizuka drives. The car races down the road.
As the car bumps on the road, the girls' breasts jiggle.
Between Saiko's legs, Hirano grins, looking forward through the gun scope. Saiko holds her arms out, the wind blowing her hair and apron. She smiles. Dead stare.
Takagi grins and points forward. Rei grimaces.
Silhouettes of dead fly up and away. The car drives through the crowd, drifts, and comes to a stop near the wall. Saiko crouches over Hirano's head. Takashi stares from 20 feet away.
Saiko leaps off the car, sword raised. She strikes one dead down, then another.
He walks along the wall.
He shoots. Shots splatter several dead, knocking dozens down like dominoes.
He turns to the other side and shoots. Dead fly back.
Saiko runs through the crowd, smiling.
Strike 1 then 2. She looks at the oncoming dead.
A third drops. She leaps, spins, and strikes a fourth.
She strikes a fifth, which spins as it flies away.
She turns and walks towards the headlights.
Saiko leaps on the humvee, flashing Hirano
Carrying the girl and puppy, he runs and leaps from the wall to the humvee.
Text, Act 7, DEAD night and the DEAD ruck
outro
Takashi lands on the humvee roof.
Shizuka drives. On the roof, Takashi sways and falls face first into Saiko's breasts. Hirano falls into the car. The girl falls after him, squishing his crotch.
The car drives down the road.

Fires burn on the Onbetsu bridge. Cars sit in gridlock on the Tokonosu side, and police cars blockade the other side The humvee drives down a deserted street that hugs the river. Takashi, Saiko, and Rei look out from the roof.
Takashi looks at the sunrise across the river.
The sun rises above the dense urban landscape into a yellow and purple sky.
Text, to be continued
Text, Preview
Text, Act 8, The DEAD way home

Post-episode footnote: In Japanese, someone is said to have "flowers floating around them" when someone has a warm and gentle personality. Used derogatorily, the person could be considered air-headed, a bimbo, or otherwise lovably dumb. This kind of so-called "fluffy" character might talk slow, think slow, become overwhlemed easily, and just as easily forgets about their problems.
